content: crochet summer bucket hat - this quick and simple hat is stylish whilst keeping your head protected from the sun rays the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog ** www crochetncreate com 1 ** size approx - adult level easy copyright ©2022 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/summer-bucket-crochet-hat/
